member.summary: Type arguments are (int oldClipAmmo, int oldBackupAmmo, int newClipAmmo, int newBackupAmmo)

member.name: P:UnityUtil.Inventory.AmmoTool.CurrentClipAmmo
member.summary: The amount of ammo currently in the main clip.

member.name: P:UnityUtil.Inventory.AmmoTool.CurrentBackupAmmo
member.summary: The total amount of ammo in all backup clips.

member.name: M:UnityUtil.Inventory.AmmoTool.Load(System.Int32)
member.summary: Load this with a specified amount of ammo.
member.param: The amount of ammo with which to load the .
member.returns: The amount of left-over ammo that could not be stored in the 's clips. Will always be >= 0.

member.name: M:UnityUtil.Inventory.AmmoTool.ReloadClip
member.summary: Reload this 's current clip from its backup ammo

member.name: T:UnityUtil.Inventory.CollectibleDestroyMode
member.summary: Determines under what circumstances, if any, a Collectible's will be destroyed.

member.name: F:UnityUtil.Inventory.CollectibleDestroyMode.Never
member.summary: Never destroy the Collectible due to detection/collection.

member.name: F:UnityUtil.Inventory.CollectibleDestroyMode.WhenDetected
member.summary: Destroy the Collectible anytime it is detected, whehter the Detector uses it or not.

member.name: F:UnityUtil.Inventory.CollectibleDestroyMode.WhenUsed
member.summary: Destroy the Collectible only when it is used by the Detector.

member.name: F:UnityUtil.Inventory.CollectibleDestroyMode.WhenEmptied
member.summary: Destroy the Collectible only when its contained value is depeleted, potentially allowing multiple collect events.

member.name: T:UnityUtil.Inventory.CollectEvent
member.summary: Type arguments are (Collector collector, Collectible collectible)

member.name: P:UnityUtil.Inventory.Tool.CurrentCharge
member.summary: The current charge of this . 0 is completely uncharged, 1 is completely charged.

member.name: M:UnityUtil.Movement.LookAtRaycast.GetUpwardUnitVector
member.summary: Returns the unit vector that this will use to rotate towards what its associated is looking at.
member.returns: The unit vector that this will use to rotate towards what its associated is looking at.
